analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that renders the VK (VKontakte) social media icon as an inline SVG.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable, self-contained VK icon for use in the UI wherever the VK social link or branding is required.

Components.name: VkIcon
Components.role: Root component that encapsulates the SVG markup for the VK logo.

Dependencies: vue (implicitly, since this is a .vue SFC)
analysis.Usage:
Import the component and include it in a template: 

import VkIcon from 'modules/icons/socials/vk.vue';

<template>
  <VkIcon />
</template>
Notes: No <script> or <style> sections — purely declarative SVG markup.
SVG size is fixed at 40×40; does not accept props to change dimensions or color.
Fill color is hardcoded to white (#fff); if theming is required, additional props or CSS overrides would be needed.
No accessibility attributes (e.g. aria-labels); consider adding title/aria-hidden if needed for screen readers.
